products.title: Stockholm Mocha Brown Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Stockholm Mocha Brown Roller Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £7.39 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Stockholm Mocha Brown is a soft milk coffee shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder - great for injecting colour into any room. Our Stockholm Mocha Brown roller blind is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms. 
 
As with all our made to measure products this blind comes with a 5 year guarantee which covers all parts of the blind.
 
 Product ID: DB-PRBX0066 Fabric Colour: Mocha Brown Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Oslo Blackout Latte Brown Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo Blackout Latte Brown Roller Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £7.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Oslo Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
This soft Latte Brown roller blind adds bold and vibrant  enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our roller are great for privacy and light control. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This light brown roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Stirlo Chocolate Brown
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Chocolate Brown Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Chocolate Brown Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Burst Brownie Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Burst Brownie Roller Blind. A dim out, wipe clean blind that can be made to over 3m. Perfect for every room in the house.
products.productdescription: The dark, dulcet tones of the Burst Brownie are a work of art, filling the room with that warm, rich energy for which it is named. With the sun behind it, this blind will fill the room with a gorgeous yet restrained brown glow that will make you feel like you are stepping into a bath of melted milk chocolate.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

Min Width: 300mm Max Width: 2500mm
